name: predictacare
description: PredictaCare is a comprehensive healthcare platform...

scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:admin: cd admin && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm install && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin && npm run build:backend && npm run build:python
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ..
